content: maya s meadow is an 11-week crochet-along starting 26 june 2023 with parts being released weekly on a monday it will be a casual affair the pattern features 12 large flower motifs and 20 small flower motifs which will be joined in strips before adding a simple lace border the motifs are well unique with most of them being diamond-shaped and a few of them being hexagon/diamond-shaped i will be using scheepjes organicon or scheepjes cotton 8 as an alternative yielding a blanket that is 126cm/49 6 wide x 156cm/41 6 long yarn packs are available from my wool warehouse shop 1 you are free to use any yarn/hook combination you fancy keeping in mind that this blanket is already big so a thicker yarn will make it massive for example using double-knit yarn and a 4mm hook will give you a blanket that is roughly 175cm/68 9 x 210cm/82 7 every single part of this design and the making of it has brought me joy i hope it will do the same for you xxx dedri 1 https //www woolwarehouse co uk/lookatwhatimade
